title: Find Me Between the Stars
description: THERE IS NO LINE THEY WON'T CROSS. Seven powerful individuals transcend the boundaries of morality and follow the invisible threads that bind all of their fates together.After Neira Aroya strikes a bargain with the enigmatic and dangerous Herald of Death, Orion Kallistar, she realizes that he has been holding on to secrets far graver than she could have ever imagined. As she navigates the alluring Lunar Realm while experiencing the full extent of her etherwalking abilities, she finally discovers the unseen force that has been pulling their strings all along.On the other side of the Cosmos, the city of Chethra is submerged in autocratic chaos. With the gangs rising to power and doing the kingâ€™s bidding, Riona is left with no choice but to run for her life while Aramis, Orpheus, and Eirene follow Zephyr on the bloody path of retribution, only to realize just how ruthless the Rafandra prince can actually be.Find Me Between the Stars is a character-driven fantasy romance about the transcendence of love, justice, and divine intervention as well as the unremitting chase between fate and agency.This is the second book in a series and it ends on a cliffhanger.
author: Iris Lake
